Subskills.name: Absolute Unit
Subskills.description: Increases the cast range of chain trap.

Subskills.name: Rusty Chaintip
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict serrated chains on hit.

Subskills.name: Sharpened Tip
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt inflicting bleeding and stunning targets on hit.

Subskills.name: Armor Piercing Force
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict armor break on hit.

Subskills.name: Target Hungry
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of targets for chain trap.

Subskills.name: Double Trouble
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional chain trap.

Subskills.name: Serrated Chaintrap
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to targets inflicted with serrated chains.

Subskills.name: Sharpened Chaintip
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by chain trap.

Subskills.name: Wait for the Prey
Subskills.description: Throw multiple deactivated chain traps. Casting chain trap again will cause the traps to activate.

Subskills.name: Efficient Reel
Subskills.description: Increases the hooking speed of chain trap.

Subskills.name: Longer Chains
Subskills.description: Increases the hooking ranged of chain trap.

Subskills.name: C4 Charged Trap
Subskills.description: After hooking monsters cause chain trap to explode dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Spinning Trap
Subskills.description: Chain trap spins its chains dealing increased damage in a large radius. No longer hooks monsters.

Subskills.name: Betrayal
Subskills.description: Chain trap now attaches to a monster on hit causing the monster to explode dealing increased damage after hooking nearby monsters in.
